object.name: speaker
object.property: <model xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="title" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Title</title> </field> <field name="email" type="plone.schema.email.Email"> <description/> <title>Email</title> </field> <field name="homepage" type="zope.schema.URI"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Homepage</title> </field> <field name="biography" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Biography</title> </field> <field name="company" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Company</title> </field> <field name="twitter_handle" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Twitter Handle</title> </field> <field name="irc_handle" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>IRC Handle</title> </field> <field name="image" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Image</title> </field> </schema> </model>
